pageProduct.name: Oral B Kids Toothpaste 3+ Years Frozen 92g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Featuring Frozen characters and a mild flavour designed especially for kids, Oral-B Kids toothpaste helps make brushing fun.

The Sugar Shield protects against acids generated from sugars to help prevent cavities.

Developed with dentists' expertise for a healthy mouth and strong teeth with regular brushing.

Oral-B, the #1 dentist recommended toothbrush brand worldwide.

General Information

Oral-B Kids 3+ Years Toothpaste 92g.

Oral-B® Frozen Kids Toothpaste with sugar shield* protects your child's teeth from acids and sugars from everyday food.

*protects against acids generated from sugar.
Sugar free fluoride toothpaste.

Size: 92g

KEY FEATURES

• Developed with dentists' expertise for Healthy Mouth and Strong Teeth** **with regular brushing
• Developed with dentists to help prevent cavities and help parents teach healthy habits
• Protects teeth from acids and sugars from everyday food
• Mild Flavour specially designed for kids

Warnings

Do not swallow. Children of 6 years and under: Use a pea sized amount for supervised brushing to minimize swallowing. Children under 2 years: ask a dentist. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor

Ingredients

Sorbitol, Water, Hydrated Silica, Trisodium Phosphate, Flavor, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Phosphate, Carbomer, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Polysorbate 80, CI 77019, CI 77891, CI 16255

Directions

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist
